Terms & Conditions

Welcome to NumerAI. Please review our operating guidelines to understand how we provide our cosmic insights.

Acceptance

By accessing NumerAI, you confirm your agreement to these terms. If you disagree with any portion, please discontinue use immediately.

Service Scope

Our numerology readings are for entertainment and personal exploration. We do not provide financial, legal, or medical advice.

Limitation

NumerAI is not liable for outcomes of decisions made based on our data. Users hold full responsibility for their life choices.

Payments

Subscriptions are billed in advance. Cancellations can be made anytime through your dashboard before the next billing cycle.

Prohibitions

Users may not scrape data, distribute malware, or attempt to bypass security protocols. Violation results in immediate ban.

Updates

We reserve the right to modify these terms. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
